definition: relations between levels of production/socio-economic relations
to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student
mountain pass/to close/to shut/to turn off/to concern/to involve
to connect/to relate to/to tie up/to bind/to be (literary)

sentences.english: A harmonious society demands a harmonious production relationship inherently.
sentences.chinese: 和谐社会内在地要求生产关系和谐。

sentences.english: For this aim, he constantly transformed the productive relationship.
sentences.chinese: 为了实现这一目标，他不断变革生产关系。

sentences.english: The fate of capitalist production relations in China is tortuous.
sentences.chinese: 资本主义生产关系在中国的命运是多舛的。

sentences.english: This is productivity those who expand pair of relations of production is counteractive.
sentences.chinese: 这是生产力发展对生产关系的反作用。

sentences.english: Abundant supplies and the relations of production under individual ownership are utterly incompatible with each other.
sentences.chinese: 个体所有制的生产关系与大量供应是完全冲突的。

sentences.english: The general line means a gradual change in the relations of production.
sentences.chinese: 总路线就是逐步改变生产关系。

sentences.english: Management mode is the concrete reflection of production relations.
sentences.chinese: 管理模式是生产关系的具体体现。

sentences.english: Ownership is the basis of productive relationship.
sentences.chinese: 所有制是生产关系的基础。

definition: natural economy (exchange of goods by bartering not involving money)
ownership of the means of production (in Marxism)/system of ownership
